Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Wood
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via: 103rd, Ashland, Beverly, 99th, Longwood, 103rd, due to, street blockage, near 103rd/Wood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via:103rd, Ashland, Beverly, 99th, Longwood, 103rd, due to, street blockage, near 103rd/Wood.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: KImball-bound Brown and Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: KImball-bound Brown and Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Washington/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
KImball-bound Brown and Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Washington/Wabash.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
